name: Idyllia
description:
Your garden needs to grow. Untangle its roots, watch it flourish, and follow its journey from life to death and back again.

Idyllia is a short downloadable puzzle game for Windows and macOS. The player solves tile-based puzzles, and for each puzzle solved, the garden grows larger and lusher. The garden, however, is greedy for life. Where will that greed take it?


Idyllia is played with a mouse or trackpad. Click on the cube to interact with it.

This game was created by the following people: John Eblahan, Carson Gilford, Darcy Gutierrez, Reef Liew, Kevin Long, Jackie Murray, and Zhixuan Xiao.
